author: Ben Westcott and David Culver, CNN
title: Tourist sites packed as China comes out of lockdown, but experts say risk still high
description: Large numbers of people flocked to popular tourists sites and major cities across China over the country's holiday weekend, despite warnings from health authorities that the risk posed by the coronavirus pandemic remains far from over.
content:
Hong Kong (CNN)Large numbers of people flocked to popular tourists sites and major cities across China over the country's holiday weekend, despite warnings from health authorities that the risk posed by the coronavirus pandemic remains far from over.
